name: ProcessPromptProps

customPromptContent.description: DESCRIPTION: These variables can be used: %context will be replaced by your context, %selection will be replaced by your selection. Provide a good prompt that combines that in a specific format

isDeferred.description: If true, it'll just validate if this will be executed, it won't return the actual result but will execute the result in the background

schema.fullComment: DESCRIPTION: These variables can be used: %context will be replaced by your context, %selection will be replaced by your selection. Provide a good prompt that combines that in a specific format
